data.eml:eml: A review of the species of Hydrometra Latreille occurring in Colombia, with a key to species and distribution map (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Padilla-Gil, Dora N. (2013): A review of the species of Hydrometra Latreille occurring in Colombia, with a key to species and distribution map (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae). Zootaxa 3686 (5): 534-542, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3686.5.2
